name: Ultimate Zombie Operation: Shopping Cart and Snow
name_original: Ultimate Zombie Operation: Shopping Cart and Snow
description:
They call us undead, or infected, but we just try to live...

During the day we observe
When the night falls we scavenge

Game made for spring epic jam 2020

Gameplay Instructions

Observation phase:
space to see trough binoculars
click with LMB to set a helper marker when looking trough binoculars (click it again to remove, you can only have 5)

Scavange phase:
Run around with WSAD
to collect an item just stop near it and wait a second, it will pop into your cart
To Store items go to Store Room (place where you started), items will be stored automatically
